p.strong: Announcing PHPConf.Asia 2018 - The Pan-Asian PHP Conference - CFP Opens Now

div.p: The third pan-Asian PHP conference will take place between 26th to 29th September 2018 in Singapore - the Garden City of the East! This is a single track, 2 days Conference (27th to 28th September 2018). Followed by 1 day of Tutorials on 29th September 2018.
Come and meet with the fastest growing PHP communities in Asia. More than 300 attendees are expected in this single track conference.
CFP Opens Now!. Hop over to https://2018.phpconf.asia for more details.
